casebody.data:
Blaine L. EVANS, an Individual Doing Business as Security Motor Sales, and Ralph Evans, v. UNITED STATES of America (two cases). Nos. 3429-3432 Circuit Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. Nov. 11, 1946. David H. Morris, of Denver, Colo., for appellants. Thomas J. Morrissey, U. S. Atty., and Joseph N. Lilly, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of Denver, Colo., for appellee.

Before PHILLIPS, BRATTON, and MURRAH, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed on motion of appellants.
